statements: SELECT * FROM health_monitoring_data;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate FROM health_monitoring_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, body_temperature FROM health_monitoring_data ORDER BY body_temperature DESC;
SELECT user_id, steps_count FROM health_monitoring_data WHERE steps_count > 5000;
SELECT MAX(heart_rate), MIN(body_temperature), AVG(steps_count) FROM health_monitoring_data;
SELECT * FROM health_monitoring_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, steps_count, heart_rate FROM health_monitoring_data ORDER BY steps_count DESC;
SELECT device_id, body_temperature FROM health_monitoring_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND steps_count < 10000;
SELECT AVG(body_temperature), MAX(heart_rate) FROM health_monitoring_data;
SELECT user_id, sleep_quality FROM health_monitoring_data WHERE sleep_quality BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY sleep_quality ASC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM WearableDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, recorded_data FROM WearableDevices WHERE device_type = 'Smartwatch';
SELECT id, user_id, recorded_at FROM UserHealthData WHERE steps_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices JOIN UserHealthData ON WearableDevices.user_id = UserHealthData.user_id;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices WHERE device_type = 'Watch' AND user_id = 123
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM WearableDevices WHERE id = 10
SELECT user_id, steps_count FROM UserHealthData WHERE steps_count > 10000 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices wd JOIN UserHealthData uhd ON wd.user_id = uhd.user_id
SELECT MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate, MIN(heart_rate) AS min_heart_rate FROM UserHealthData
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM health_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT user_id, date, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data WHERE hours_slept >= 7 AND sleep_quality < 3;
SELECT username, age FROM users INNER JOIN health_data ON users.user_id = health_data.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, steps, calories_burned FROM users JOIN health_data ON users.user_id = health_data.user_id WHERE steps > 10000;
SELECT username, date, hours_slept FROM users JOIN sleep_data ON users.user_id = sleep_data.user_id WHERE sleep_quality > 7 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT users.username, health_data.heart_rate, sleep_data.hours_slept FROM users JOIN health_data ON users.user_id = health_data.user_id JOIN sleep_data ON users.user_id = sleep_data.user_id;
SELECT * FROM wearables_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, purchase_date FROM devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_insights FROM health_insights GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_insights > 10;
SELECT * FROM wearables_data WHERE data_type = 'heart_rate';
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, gender, contact_no FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 50;
SELECT user_id, insight_date, insight_text FROM health_insights WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, device_id, timestamp FROM wearable_devices WHERE sensor_type = 'Accelerometer';
SELECT sensor_id, heart_rate FROM heart_rate WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT sensor_id, step_count, distance, calories_burned FROM steps_data WHERE step_count < 5000;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT user_id, name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, heart_rate FROM heart_rate WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM wearable_devices WHERE sensor_type = 'HRM') ORDER BY heart_rate ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sleep_quality, sleep_duration FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_quality >= 3 ORDER BY sleep_duration DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, step_count, distance, calories_burned FROM steps_data WHERE distance > 1.5 AND calories_burned < 100 ORDER BY step_count ASC;
